channel.title: Fixed Compiling, Now Need to Fix the Running :\
channel.description:
[code] 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
I have jdk 6u15, Compiling works, just not running, AGAIN Here's Runserver.bat, if you need it
[code] @echo off title JC-SCAPE 525 java -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar com.rs2hd.Main pause [/code]

item.title: Fixed Compiling, Now Need to Fix the Running :\
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

set your classpaths in my computer

Name: CLASSPATH CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%; Name: PATH C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;

Just change the jdk version to what u got.

I’d say go look at this tutorial

Here

Read full topic

item.title: Fixed Compiling, Now Need to Fix the Running :\
item.dc:creator: @iTanq iTanq
item.description:
@iTanq wrote:

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

I have jdk 6u15, Compiling works, just not running, AGAIN
Here’s Runserver.bat, if you need it

@echo off
title JC-SCAPE 525
java -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar com.rs2hd.Main
pause
